attributes.action: hold a referendum on the publics right to personal protection.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The public are not being protected by the police. Recent news events show a number of incidents where people have been killed while trying to protect their family or property. The Home Secretary has admitted to not feeling safe on the streets. This petition calls on the government to hold a public referendum, to discuss the need for personal protection and how this can be best achieved. The referendum should have the power to call for changes to the law if required.
